name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Developer Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications tailored for ERP solutions and relational database systems. Expertise in **C#**, **Java**, and **object-oriented development** drives robust application architecture and seamless integration. Proven ability in team collaboration and customer-oriented approaches to meet project objectives.
Skilled in meticulous analysis and documentation practices to ensure clarity and transparency in project workflows. Adept at applying excellent communication skills to promote effective remote support and collaboration across teams. Additionally, strong proficiency in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development leveraging **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Possesses a solid foundation in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics, while proficiently deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure** and implementing microservices architectures and CI/CD pipelines.
